title: Apocalypse Hero System - Novel Updates
tags: Game Elements   Male Protagonist   Post-apocalyptic   Zombies
author: 雨未寒
description: A man was struck by lightning, and wakes up to find that it's the end of the world. With the help of unreliable systems, his wits, and some dependable partners, Li Yuanghong will search for his own way to survive.>
